title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, September 10, 2021
description: Poet Mary Oliver was born on this day 1935. “One thing I do know is that poetry, to be understood, must be clear. It mustn’t be fancy.” She must have been right, as her poetry was consistently on the Best Sellers lists.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
